statements: DELETE FROM feedbacks WHERE user_id = 10 AND activity_id = 3;
DELETE FROM feedbacks WHERE id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4.5 OR (user_id = 10 AND activity_id = 20);
DELETE FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1 AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM ActivityAssessment WHERE assessment_score >= 90 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserAssessment WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_id = 201;
DELETE FROM assessments WHERE user_id = 5 AND assessment_type = 'exam';
